statements: SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE consent_given = true;
SELECT research_data FROM research_data WHERE participant_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE research_topic LIKE '%biology%';
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, consent_given FROM research_data WHERE participant_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT participant_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning' ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT participant_name, research_data FROM research_data WHERE research_topic LIKE '%Neural Networks%' ORDER BY participant_id ASC, participant_name DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE research_topic = 'Data Mining' AND consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT research_data FROM research_data WHERE participant_name LIKE 'A%' OR participant_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY participant_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM study_participants;
SELECT participant_id, name, age, email FROM study_participants WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT participant_id, name, age, gender, email FROM study_participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT participant_id, name, age, gender, email FROM study_participants ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT participant_id, name, gender, email FROM study_participants WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT name, age, gender, email FROM study_participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM study_participants WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT participant_id, research_study_name, data_timestamp FROM research_data WHERE data_analyzed = true;
SELECT name, age, email FROM study_participants WHERE gender='Female' AND consent_given = true;
SELECT participant_id, research_study_name, data_timestamp FROM research_data WHERE data_analyzed = false ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_gender FROM Participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT study_topic, study_description FROM ResearchStudies WHERE study_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM StudyData ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT participant_name, data_collected FROM Participants JOIN StudyData ON Participants.participant_id = StudyData.participant_id WHERE StudyData.study_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT participant_name, participant_gender FROM Participants WHERE consent_given = TRUE ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT study_topic, study_description FROM ResearchStudies WHERE study_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, lead_researcher, data_collected FROM Participants p JOIN StudyData sd ON p.participant_id = sd.participant_id WHERE sd.data_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';

SELECT p.participant_name, s.study_topic FROM Participants p JOIN StudyData sd ON p.participant_id = sd.participant_id JOIN ResearchStudies s ON sd.study_id = s.study_id WHERE p.participant_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Studies;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM Studies ORDER BY study_start_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM Participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT data_id, study_id, participant_id FROM StudyData WHERE data_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT form_id, consent_given FROM ConsentForms WHERE consent_given = TRUE ORDER BY consent_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM Studies WHERE study_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM Studies WHERE study_end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT study_name, participant_name FROM Studies s JOIN StudyData sd ON s.study_id = sd.study_id JOIN Participants p ON p.participant_id = sd.participant_id;

SELECT p.participant_name, sd.data_values ->> 'field_1' AS field_value FROM StudyData sd JOIN Participants p ON p.participant_id = sd.participant_id WHERE sd.data_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';
SELECT form_id, consent_text FROM ConsentForms WHERE consent_given = TRUE ORDER BY consent_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM studies;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM studies WHERE ethical_approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age > 18 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT study_name, analysis_results, analyzed_by FROM studies JOIN data_analysis ON studies.study_id = data_analysis.study_id;
SELECT study_id, study_name FROM studies;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name, start_date FROM studies WHERE ethical_approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE consent_given = TRUE AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT study_name, COUNT(DISTINCT participant_id) AS participant_count FROM data_collection GROUP BY study_name;
